name: Forest Neighborhood
description:
A game bout helping each other on bad days.

I did this game with my friend Amandine. She coded everything and I did the artwork. We had a great time together even if we mostly spent hours on our own computers without saying a word to each other. There are still many things to improve but we are both happy and proud of the result!
